Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Avenue, south of Roger's Taxidermy.
Room.LongDescription: After a good hunting trip, many hunters prefer to have their catch stuffed as a trophy to display proudly and tell friends how they single handedly cut down this towering grizzly bear. On the south side of the road, you can hear the faint cheers from the spectators at the Ivanhouse Sporting Facility.
